description: This file defines a Flutter widget for displaying search results in a mobile application. It manages user input, interacts with a search provider for data fetching, and presents a grid of book items.

classes.name: SearchResultsPage
classes.description: A StatefulWidget representing the search results page, initialized with an optional search query.

classes.name: _SearchResultsPageState
classes.description: State class managing the search input controller, initiating searches, and building the UI with results.

methods.name: createState
methods.description: Creates and returns the mutable state for this widget.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes the controller and triggers an initial search if a query is provided.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the search results page, including app bar and grid of books.
